content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at position (-15.0, -76.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -76.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (-15.5, -77.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-19.0, -73.0) with no ingredients to smelt

### Iron Plate Production Facility at position (6.0, -62.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (6.0, -62.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Inserter at position (6.5, -60.5) not receiving electricity
- Wooden Chest at position (6.5, -59.5) storing iron ore and iron plates

### Iron Plate Production Facility at position (9.0, -64.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (9.0, -64.0) with no ingredients to smelt

### Water Supply System at position (-47.5, -123.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore Pump at position (-47.5, -123.5) connected to a Pipe Group starting at position (-47.5, -122.5)

### Electricity Network
Consists of the following entities:
- Multiple Small Electric Poles forming an Electricity Group with no voltage

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing steam engines
- Ensure the target location is clear of obstructions before attempting to place a steam engine.

### Errors when connecting to the power network
- Verify that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to connect to the power network.
- Ensure that all components are correctly positioned and connected to the power network to avoid connectivity issues.

### Errors due to lack of ingredients or full chests
- Regularly check and empty chests to prevent mining drills from halting due to full output.
- Ensure that furnaces have the necessary ingredients to operate efficiently.
